entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
